alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Addison, north central Rutland, northwestern Windsor and southwestern Washington Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ripton to near Pittsford. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding on roadways likely. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Middlebury, Hancock, Ripton, Bristol, Lincoln, Proctor, Chittenden, Brandon, Leicester, Pittsford, Goshen, Mendon, West Rutland, Rutland City, Salisbury, Warren, Granville, Rochester, and Fayston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
